title: GlenAllachie Single Cask Tasting: A Memorable Evening at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
On Thursday, April 10, 2025, Club Mareva Beirut proudly hosted an exceptional whisky event that quickly became a memorable highlight for our esteemed guests. The GlenAllachie Single Cask Tasting drew a full house, reflecting the immense enthusiasm and appreciation for premium whisky experiences in Beirut.

GlenAllachie holds a special place at Club Mareva Beirut. As an extraordinary brand known for its meticulous craftsmanship and exceptional quality, GlenAllachie consistently excites whisky aficionados. We are honored to frequently be the first to host tasting events featuring their latest and most exclusive releases, ensuring our guests always have early access to these outstanding whiskies. Expertly guided by renowned whisky connoisseur Jean Paul Abdallah, attendees enjoyed an exclusive tasting of three rare single-cask selections, each handpicked by legendary whisky maker Billy Walker:
  • GlenAllachie 2009 – 15 Years Old – Virgin Oak Barrel – 56.9% ABV
  • GlenAllachie 2011 – 13 Years Old – Oloroso Hogshead – 60.6% ABV
  • GlenAllachie 2012 – 12 Years Old – PX Hogshead – 58.3% ABV
Each pour provided an intricate exploration of flavor profiles, showcasing GlenAllachie’s dedication to quality, complexity, and craftsmanship. Guests delighted in the rich tapestry of aromas and tastes—from vibrant oak spice to decadent dried fruit nuances. Beyond the whisky, the evening was marked by engaging conversations and the shared joy of discovering remarkable spirits in an intimate and sophisticated setting. We sincerely thank everyone who attended and made this evening extraordinary. The event’s popularity confirms Club Mareva Beirut as a premier destination for unforgettable tasting experiences. Stay connected for future events—we promise more unique and enriching whisky journeys await you at Club Mareva Beirut.
